topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587a40f636872390d002699#post_5587a40f636872390d002699
Northern China is especially running out of water. 80% of China's water resource is in the south. Plus most of the river in the north are polluted as hell. Sucks that the Mother River, the cradle of Chinese civilization, my ancestral region, is going to die...

I guess it was a good thing for my family to have fled to Taiwan after WW2 and eventually to Canada.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body: Although the Chinese civilization began in the north, along the Yellow River in the Central Plain, Henan province. Throughout the ages, due to political logistical reasons, flooding, desertification, and relentless barbarian raids. Many Han Chinese migrated southwards. That is why Southern China is more populated and economically prosperous today.

topics.body:
So, if the new Spider Man movie portrayed Miles Morales instead of Peter Parker, how would you feel?
Personally, I'm fine with that. Peter Parker was fun but I'm just tired of him. I don't want to see the same character over and over again.

well, recently balanced

the group was repurposed on zetaboards the day bungie came online with its new format (a hellspawn of reddit and twitter)

i was there for a month or two before i was met with a permaban, haven't looked back since... until now

from what ive heard they had nazi-esque moderation for a good long while when the main admin decided to integrate his clan with the group, but they've been long purged

haven't heard much from the group since then
